title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, December 28, 2020
description: It was on this day in 1895 that Auguste and Louis Lumière had the first commercial movie screening at the Grand Café in Paris. The film was 46 seconds long.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1895 that Auguste and Louis Lumière had the first commercial movie screening at the Grand Café in Paris. The film was 46 seconds long.
